text: A belated but huge Comp Sci welcome to Kaviya as our new Postgrad Taught Department Community Coordinator (DCC)!  Please contact Kaviya using our DCC team email - cs-community-coordinator@york.ac.uk https://t.co/k7iDZbnyvC

text:
This Saturday starting at 7:30pm in The Lounge we have our CS Charity Winter Social, free to all CS Students! ☃️

To attend, you can get tickets via your university emails (search for Winter Social) 🎟️

We will be fundraising for York Foodbank ✨
~ CS Community Coordinators https://t.co/flExz405dH
imgAlt: A graphic advertising the CS Charity Winter Social this Saturday, starting at 7:30PM in the Lounge, Roger Kirk Centre.

text: Come & join us for our Marginalised Students’ event today. We start at 1900. https://t.co/7tzH6BPRi7
imgAlt: Tasha (our UG DCC) with some bubbles for Marginalised Students’ event …

text: Well done to everyone for supporting our Halloween fundraiser! To date we raised £241 which the department will match for @YorkFoodbank Amazing work by Tasha (our undergrad DCC) & thanks so much to everyone for participating 🙏🏽 https://t.co/2rJg5aJJV8
imgAlt: Tasha (our Undergrad DCC) who succesfully organised our Halloween fundraiser for York Foodbank.

text: Our Halloween fun today is raising funds for @YorkFoodbank Please if you can donate: https://t.co/EoVUhiqjmQ
Undergrads getting into the Halloween spirit too! Owen as Dracula & Joe has been mummified!🧛‍♂️ 👻 https://t.co/P5G38ww5AS
Don’t forget to share your photos of your spooky outfits today! 👻🎃🕸 https://t.co/xcaWjKqJo9

Sign up to this year's Women in Tech mentoring sessions to discuss your future career aspirations, tips on the recruitment process, how to be confident in the workplace, plus much more!  Deadline: midday on 20th Oct! Apply here 👉https://t.co/2Y2cSqYDzI\n\n#CSemployability

Student Connect is the easy way to make new friends and expand your uni network. Sign up to be matched with others on your course or in your college. Meet new people, discover new places, and find new interests. Match. Chat. Meet.
Don't forget to apply to be our new PGT DCC by the 10th October. DCC are paid roles that support our student community in CS. https://t.co/FO0pKfdqsj

#WorkFair is the world’s largest free virtual careers fair for LGBTQ+ professionals and graduates providing direct access to inclusive employers across all industries on 19 October 2022. Register now: https://t.co/aeECNbtqV0 https://t.co/5TUyPE4Xzk
The JobCrowd's 2022/23 Top Companies for Graduates to Work for Guide is out now, and they also have a digital version: https://t.co/k0EyU2z5ur

IBM graduate and placement roles are opening soon. Register your interest now so that you get notified as soon as the roles go live as they are filled essentially on a first-come-first served basis, so being early is key! https://t.co/rhNy2AxGtc

🎉 Our Careers Fairs 2022 are starting next Wednesday 🎉 Have you checked out the list of attending employers yet? You never know, one of them could be ✨the one✨!
⚖️ Law Fair - https://t.co/D0O1uZVVlw
💼 Grad Jobs Fair - https://t.co/pZAXiWCk61 https://t.co/nU6EBGjifa

Having welcomed Undergrads & PGTs last week (see @UoY_CSstudents) - this week is the turn of our amazing Postgraduate Researchers (PGRs)!  We have just commenced our games for this afternoon! 👋🏽 https://t.co/z65C80YZVW

📢  Calling all new MSc & PGT students! Applications are open to become our PGT Department Community Coordinator (DCC). This is a paid role & is a great opportunity to support our community! 
Apply via: https://t.co/9Mq51PS1Zj
Apps close 10th October! https://t.co/cdukod4yPO
